thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 42 9
thread.title: Tony Gebrail
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Tony Gebrail

author: Tony Gebrail
title: Tony Gebrail
text: Ordered an android box. Item took 3 months to arrive. It came damaged and they asked for pictures. After I sent pictures they took another 2 weeks to respond (after numerous emails from me). Then they wanted me to send it back on my cost which would have been a third of the cost of the item and they would look at it. For all this hassle, I just tossed it- not worth it dealing with them and being out more money.
